00013 /*
00014  * per-device, per-activity energy data is shared between Battery and
00015  * BatteryStats using the DeviceEntry data structure
00016  *
00017  ***************************************************************************/
00018 
00019 #ifndef DEVICEENTRY_H
00020 #define DEVICEENTRY_H
00021 
00022 #include "MiXiMDefs.h"
00023 
00035 class MIXIM_API DeviceEntry
00036   {
00037   public:
00039     opp_string  name;
00041     double  draw;
00043     int   currentActivity;
00046     int   numAccts;
00048     double  *accts;
00050     simtime_t *times;
00051 
00053     DeviceEntry() {
00054       name = NULL;
00055       draw = 0.0;
00056       numAccts = 0;
00057       currentActivity = -1;
00058       accts = NULL;
00059       times = NULL;
00060     }
00061 
00062     ~DeviceEntry() {
00063       delete []  accts;
00064       delete [] times;
00065     }
00066   };
00067 
00068 #endif
00069
